stories.headline: To have or to have not
stories.summary: J.J. Thompson explores income inequality using the Gini coefficient to analyze income data, showing the growing gap between different economic classes.

stories.headline: Collision course
stories.summary: Rick Linsk reports on the analysis of data from the Fatal Accident Reporting System to understand trends and demographics in fatal traffic accidents, particularly incidents involving older drivers.

stories.headline: Wire service serves CAR
stories.summary: Jody Sowell discusses the Associated Press' efforts to enhance computer-assisted reporting capabilities across its bureaus through a new Web server initiative.
